transcription: Italian-style dining and live music in your home. We will help you create an unforgettable evening by bringing a piece of Italy directly to your home.  Our qualified chef will prepare delicious, authentic meals in the Italian tradition for you and your friends and will explain the ingredients and techniques used. After eating, you will listen to the most beautiful Italian songs  Performed live by our professional musicians. Powered by U-Manager. MuSeat.
